name: InfiniteBeat
description:
Infinite beat is a game where you get an opportunity to show who has better reflexes and choose the right disc to play.
The aim of the game is not only to pass the level, but to survive as long as possible and gain as many points as possible while enjoying the beautiful effects and nice music.
The game is currently in a minimum viable product with the basic mechanics and contains just few songs. Our goal is to expand the game to suit you.
We plan to add new mods (exercises), new power ups, reward system, music, and much more in the future to pleasure you.
